summary: Backstory: Mandy was exiled from the Greybeards for Ill-Use of The Voice, she now stays in the Nightgate inn, waiting for a new Patron to lead her into the Field of Battle once more.
descriptionHtml:
Like all my Characters to come, she is a Marriage Candidate as well as a follower.
She is found in the Nightgate Inn and knows the following shouts:
Call of Valor
Unrelenting Force
Whirlwind Sprint
Ice Form
Fire breath
Disarm.

Be careful! She will use Ice Form frequently, and has no AI tweaks; So it's likely you will be Friendly - Fired!
author: OGMSCOLEPEARSON
